attributes.action: ensure swift police investigation of all apparently fraudulent MP expenses and withold relocation allowances etc from all MPs who have chosen to stand down at the next election due to the current expenses allegations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM has taken no decisive action regarding legal prosecutions for fraudulent MP expenses claims and instead is creating a smokescreen out of 'constitutional reform'.  No MPs have as yet been questioned under caution by the Police.  We call on him to ensure such allegations are investigated with the full vigour of the law, as they would be under any other circumstances, and to ensure that no MP under such investigation receives any pay-off allowances until any allegations against them have been disproved.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
